[[b]]Taoist Soldiers[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Unique Roster[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:scope_description]]Soldiers formed from both the worst and best of your men, they would fight to death for you.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Your people love you, they would fight to death for you, for your ancestors and successors.[[/col]][[/i]]
